name: Bottle Cap Challenge 2k19
description:
Join the bottle cap challenge to kick open bottles like a boss!

Become a part of a viral celebrity game or a kick off challenge of your own. Perform spinning kicks like a true kickboxing star!

===Tap to Kick===
Simply tap the screen at just the right time to unscrew the bottle. Get ready, take aim, and kick the cap with a jaw-dropping spin kick!

===Set the World Record====
How many caps in a row can you kick open? Set a record for unscrewing the most caps per round and show everyone who’s the boss!

===Pick Your Hero===
You’ll have a team of tough guys to choose from. Unlock the best fighter and start unscrewing caps like crazy!

===Untwist Caps===
Every cap is different! The wide ones are kid’s stuff. But for narrow caps, you might need additional training. Once you’ve mastered unscrewing plain bottle caps, test your skills with a tough “boss” cap.

Features:
• Simple game interface
• Fun graphics and highly addicting kick cap gameplay
• Different caps – from easy to tricky “boss” caps
• Variety of cool heroes to choose from

Tough day? It doesn’t take a lot to unwind – all you need is a bottle! You can spin the bottle, play the bottle drop game, or challenge your friends in water bottle flip games. You can even go after an impossible water bottle flip. Or you сan open the app and just kick a bottle to vent your stress.

Are you ready to take on the bottle cap challenge? Come on in and join the fun!
